UC-12B (N528NA) Aircraft Location and Attitude Data
LMOS 2017

2017,05,22,2018,08,24

UTC_start,seconds, start UTC time in seconds from midnight of the starting data collecting day

1,1,1,1,1,1
-9999,-9999,-9999, -9999, -9999, -9999
AltGPS, km, 1 Hz aircraft GPS altitude data
Lat, deg, 1 HZ aircraft GPS latitude data
Lon, deg, 1 Hz aircraft GPS longitude data
Roll, deg, 1 Hz aircraft roll angle
Pitch, deg, 1 Hz aircraft pitch angle
Hdg_GPS, deg, 1 Hz aircraft heading

17
PI_CONTACT_INFO: Scott Janz, scott.j.janz@nasa.gov
Platform: UC-12B King Air (N528NA)
LOCATION: Included in data records
ASSOCIATED_DATA: N/A
INSTRUMENT_INFO: Applanix POSAV 510 
DATA_INFO: 1 Hz data
UNCERTAINTY: < 0.1 m Horizontal, < 0.2 m Vertical, 0.005 deg for pitch and roll angles, and 0.008 deg for heading
ULOD_FLAG: -7777
ULOD_VALUE: N/A
LLOD_FLAG: -8888
LLOD_VALUE: N/A;
